channel.name: CSPAN 3 US
channel.title: NTSB Holds Third Day of Investigative Hearing on Jan. 29 Mid-Air Collision
channel.desc: The National Transportation Safety Board holds the third day of hearings on the investigation into the mid-air collision between a commercial airliner and a U.S. Army helicopter.
